column1: A gingerbread man living in a home made of his own flesh.
A Santa Claus who is most definitely white.
An uncanny correlation between a family's financial situation and Santa's generosity.
Being nice in December so you can be a douche for the rest of the year.
Buying Christmas presents after Christmas when everything's on sale.
Calling it 'X-mas' just to annoy people.
Christmas albums that all sound the same.
Getting groin-tickled by Santa's white beard.
Getting only 25 of the 28 presents on your list.
Giving a homeless person a gingerbread house.
Kids who care about the color of Santa's skin.
Placing the Christmas tree next to Burnie the Radiator.
Reusing present wrapping to save money.
The difficulty to finding presents for your parents.
The dissapointment of a Jewish child on the 25th.
The image of a crucified Santa Claus.
The increase in suicide rates on Christmas Day.
The North Pole, if you know what I mean.
The rest of the reindeer who no one gives a shit about.
The systematic oppression of the entire elf race.
Uncomfortable hugs from relatives you only see once a year.
Using child labor to make toys for the first world.
